title: Bug 121323: XML Edit Data Set dialog does not persist filter information
OB: When leaving the XML Edit Data Set dialog, any data stored in the filterInfo HashMap is lost.
EB: The XML Edit Data Set dialog should persist the data stored in the filterInfo HashMap when the dialog is closed.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Open the XML Edit Data Set dialog.
2. Enter an XPath expression for the column mapping with a selection part like section[@id='left']
3. Close the dialog.
4. Check if the data stored in the filterInfo HashMap is lost.
